name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: File Channels- Free Video & Screen Recorder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily record personalized video, add documents and share, engage instantly when viewed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your sales success with interactive video messaging.

Improve email responses & close more with File Channels.

Easily record video messages, include brochures or proposals, interact with chat & video calls when your message is received.

Capture your screen with or without your camera, simply record your camera, add documents and share with a simple link via email.

Get notified and track when accessed. Engage instantly with chat or video calls and update anytime.

Ideal for sales and marketing processionals.

Free to use

Screen record with or without camera

Camera recording

Upload videos and documents

Live updates and engagement

Instant on demand video calling
